messages.title: Bro, it's so cold
messages.body: Portland is so cold and snowy.  I'm cold AF!  Where all the warm ladies at?
messages.author: SwoleBro

messages.title: My car won't start
messages.body: I put the key in and turn it, but nothing happens.  What is my problem?
messages.author: ConfusedInPortland
messages.notes: The needle is at E on the gas gauge, is that important?

messages.title: Milk Substitue?
messages.body: I think my cows are allergic to milk.  Is this a normal thing, or do I have a serious problem?
messages.author: Cow lover

replies.author: kellie
replies.body: The ladies are as far away from you as possible

replies.author: jillyJam
replies.body: what kind of milk are you feeding them?
